```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(igraph)
library(janitor)

```

# Check the data
```{r}
df <- read.csv("linkedin_connections.csv", skip = 3)

df <- clean_names(df)

df <- df %>% 
  select(-c("email_address"))

df

```

# Standardize the name of the company
```{r}
df$company <- df %>% 
  select(company) %>% 
  str_to_lower(.)
  

df
```



# Get the count of countact by companys
```{r}
df %>% 
  group_by(company) %>% 
  count() %>% 
  arrange(desc(n))
  



```
